name: Slow Moving
query:
SELECT
`tabItem`.`company` as "Company::100",
`tabStock Ledger Entry`.`country` as "Country::100",
`tabItem`.`name` as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
`tabItem`.`item_name` as "Item Name::300",
`tabItem`.`item_group` as "Item Group::100",
`tabStock Ledger Entry`.warehouse as "Warehouse::200",
`tabItem Supplier`.supplier as "Supplier::150",
`tabItem Supplier`.supplier_part_no as "Part No::100",
`tabStock Ledger Entry`.qty_after_transaction as "Stock::100",
`tabStock Ledger Entry`.posting_date as "Last Transaction Date:Date:150",
DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),`tabStock Ledger Entry`.posting_date) as "Age(in Days)::100"
FROM
`tabItem`
Left Join `tabStock Ledger Entry` ON `tabItem`.name =`tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code
Left Join `tabItem Default` ON `tabItem`.name =`tabItem Default`.parent
Left Join `tabItem Supplier` ON `tabItem`.name =`tabItem Supplier`.parent
WHERE
`tabStock Ledger Entry`.posting_date < DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
AND
`tabItem Default`.default_warehouse = `tabStock Ledger Entry`.warehouse
AND
posting_date=(
SELECT MAX(`tabStock Ledger Entry`.posting_date) FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` WHERE `tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code=`tabItem`.`name`);
